EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-10-29 eBlast 2 to Customers re: 6.2.ES-2018-10-29 eBlast 2 to Customers
EmailTemplate.subject: Unlock Cloud Elasticity. Lower Cloud Bills.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I'm reaching out to make sure you have what you need to take full advantage of the new features at your disposal in Turbonomic 6.2. If you haven't upgraded already, contact your CX rep who would be happy to help you upgrade. In the meantime, check out our live demo <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/live-demo-how-to-unlock-cloud-elasticity-to-lower-cloud-bills?utm_campaign=70157000001bYHwAAM]]> which explores a few key aspects of our latest product release <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-6-2]]> including:
- Turbonomic scaling in the cloud—6.2 adds enhancements for both AWS and Azure. Determine the right compute & storage templates for your workload. - Percentile scaling—Push the bounds of cost optimization in the cloud by telling Turbo to be more conservative or aggressive with its scaling recommendations. - Time scaling—Adjust the timeframe at which Turbonomic observes peaks to best fit your business needs.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/live-demo-how-to-unlock-cloud-elasticity-to-lower-cloud-bills?utm_campaign=70157000001bYHwAAM]]>
We hope you find the recording helpful. Check out our Resource Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-6-2]]> or reach out to your CX rep to learn more!
Best, Elizabeth
